title: How is "sharing CUDA tensor between processes" implemented?
body_html:
As mentioned in https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/ca555abcf93fe7c874705d881ba4839bef495ed0/docs/source/notes/multiprocessing.rst#sharing-cuda-tensors, CUDA tensors could be shared between processes.

Could anyone tell me how it's implemented, or point me to the code?

Thanks!
Helin
